name: Search For Custom Fields
author: Stéphane Lion

sections.description:
Boost the custom fields of WordPress with this plugin:

– Simplified creation of fields when writing your posts and pages.
– Activate the widget to propose to your visitors the search on your fields.
– Customize the result of the search results in the options of the plugin.
– Insert the shortcode in your content to display the fields.
– Insert a search form in your pages or articles.
sections.installation:
To install the plugin:

– Unpack the ZIP file,
– Place the decompressed folder in the wp-content / plugins / folder of your site,
– In the administration of your site, go to “Extensions” then click on “Activate” for the plugin “Search For Custom Fields”,
– A new “Search For Custom Fields” menu will appear.
sections.changelog:
1.1

Added translation functions
Minor fixes

1.0

First version of the plugin
